ygData.subject: RE: New Quest Items
ygData.msgSnippet: I have seen screenshots of the arms and bracers of the new ranger armor Ive Etched armor     the bracers are not lore or no drop   the arms are lore but also
ygData.messageBody:
I have seen screenshots of the arms and bracers of the new ranger armor
Ive Etched armor the bracers are not lore or no drop the arms are lore
but also not no drop

Trevalien

p.s. this may change when the patch goes live
